item.description:
Join us for a new start and create a great year for yourself and others! We will have a fairly flexible agenda so that everyone has a chance to mingle and meet eachother. Bring business cards and an appetite for success!!

Feel free to invite friends you think may be interested in the group as well. Email me with any questions.

See you soon!

group.name: The Boston Green Business Networking Group

item.name: Let's make it a great New Year!
